summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West 59th Street, from 14th Avenue Northwest to 24th Avenue Northwest; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6530, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
